module.name: PBX End Point Manager
module.description: PBX End Point Manager supports automated deployment of multiple manufacturers IP telephones.
module.changelog: *2.4.0alpha2* You can add phones now, added information to Extensions Page on FreePBX *2.4.0alpha1* First Alpha of Multi-Lines *2.3.2* Various Bug Fixes *2.3.1* Install directory case corrections *2.3.0* No Changes
